member.name: SYNCMGRITEM
member.summary: Provides information about items being enumerated by the interface.

member.name: SYNCMGRITEM.dwFlags
member.summary: One or more values from the enumeration.

summary.para: Indicates whether this item is included in synchronization operations. This member can have one of the following values.
The default is not including this item in synchronization operations.
The default is including this item in synchronization operations.

member.name: SYNCMGRITEM.ftLastUpdate
member.summary: The time of the last synchronization for this item.
